item.title: Why 2025 has been such a historic year for oil — with prices set to finish near a 5-year low
item.description: The world has more oil than it needs, but a drop in crude prices this week to the lowest level in nearly five years may help slow production and boost...

item.title: Energy stocks are the new bonds, this strategist argues
item.description: In an inflationary setting, why hold bonds at all, says Louis-Vincent Gave

item.title: ‘We all have economic jitters’: After the Fed cut rates, should my son buy a $600K house?
item.description: “They are tuned in to friends and colleagues, who are losing jobs, cognizant of shifts in company agendas and financial worries.”

item.title: ‘Am I simply the unloved son?’ My mother ghosted me after my father died. Is she stealing his money?
item.description: “No phone calls, no holiday cards, no explanation, no anything.”
